clean_data: Cyber Security Consultant Cyber span lSecurityspan Consultant Information Assurance Professional w BS IT Degree Clearance CISSP Huntsville AL Goal oriented senior IA Professional with demonstrated experience in planning developing and implementing solutions to address both business opportunities and DoD IC requirements Proven experience in providing Risk Management Framework RMF and Industrial Control Systems ICS expertise as well as creating IA focused business processes and policies based on business requirements and industry best practices Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Cyber Security Consultant Talon Cyber LLC September 2017 to Present Cyber Security Consultant Provide customers advice suggestions material and training relevant to the cyber security of organizational networks and personnel privacy Create RMF Standard Operating Procedures SOPs and policies identifying organizational standards based on DoD requirements Review and update system documentation including technical configuration management and policy documentation for upcoming Security Controls Assessor SCA inspections Interface with Major Command MAJCOM Cyber Security to help shape new Command level assess only RMF process received first product Authorization To Operate ATO via this process Review Industrial Control System ICS design documentation from vendors compare to contract specifications provided by government identify design issues work with vendors to correct designs and create RMF documentation set for government approval Interface with higher level MAJCOM Information System Security Management office to implement rapid ATO process for highly specialized calibration network Information Assurance Subject Matter Expert Sentar Huntsville AL October 2014 to Present Senior level Subject Matter Expert supporting the Headquarters Army Materiel Command HQ AMC G2 as Acting Information Assurance Program Manager IAPM for the Certification Accreditation CA of the Joint Worldwide Intelligence Communications System JWICS deployed across the Continental United States CONUS Developed and implemented a Program Management Plan PMP to accomplish and maintain system certification using Intelligence Community Directive ICD 503 and other related DoD Army governing regulations Provided regular updates to Senior Military Leadership and coordinated with government and contractor staff across JWICS CONUS locations regarding the CA status of JWICS sites across the Command Implemented new processes for AMC Headquarters HQ that ensured timely coordination of and increased effectiveness and efficiencies across AMC for JWICS CA activities Developed Command level policies procedures and directives that provide a security framework for subordinate commands to integrate into as well as maintain efficient Assessment and Authorization AA processes during upcoming Risk Management Framework RMF transition Cyber Security Subject Matter Expert SME Sentar December 2016 to September 2017 Industrial Control System ICS Analyst Jun Sept 2017 Provide senior level support to prime contractor building facility for new radar system by reviewing consolidated specifications for security power and fire safety systems and matching vendor designs with Unified Facilities Criteria UFC requirements Review hardware and software lists data flow topology diagrams and product data sheets to ensure system representation matches consolidated system design Draft RMF control sets for ICS systems based on national guidelines and regulations Provide training to team subcontractors as well as prime contractor on implementation of RMF process onto ICS systems Create system authorization package and submit to government Authorization Official AO for completed system build before facility enabling smooth transition to final government customer Information System Security Manager Dec 2016 Jun 2017 Senior level support with subject matter expertise of cyber operations and mission analysis Provided Information System Security Manager ISSM support to the Army Materiel Command AMC G2 Information Assurance Program Manager IAPM for the Joint Worldwide Intelligence Communication System JWICS deployed across the Continental United States CONUS Created and updated engineering level topology maps of JWICS enterprise backbone and site infrastructure Implemented new Risk Management Framework RMF processes for Headquarters HQ AMC G2 Assessment Authorization AA packages ensuring critical mitigations are implemented Created inspection checklists from RMF critical control set for Staff Assistance Visits and Site Specific Authorizations Senior Cyber Security Specialist Jacobs ISG November 2016 to November 2016 Support Program Executive Office PEO Missiles and Space MS by performing Risk Management Framework RMF Assessment Authorization AA control validations for the Defense Research and Engineering Network DREN Ensured validity and accuracy of all associated documentation including applicable RMF AA control sets implementation records security policies and system security plans Developed policies where needed Additionally responsible for analyzing and defining security requirements of information protection for enterprise systems network compliance and audit monitoring and inspections across multiple networks throughout the PEO MS enterprise Information Security Analyst Leidos Huntsville AL May 2012 to October 2014 Develop IA strategies by contributing information analysis and recommendations to strategic thinking and direction establishing IA objectives in line with organizational objectives Create plans policies doctrine and regulations to support creation of standardized IA processes Deliver IA program consolidation and development recommendations at the DoD and Intelligence Community level Provide Information Assurance IA guidance to geographically separated team of IT professionals consisting of help desk system administrators and network engineers while centralizing management of Certification and Accreditation CA test activities for JAFAN 63 and Risk Management Framework RMF processes Review Information Assurance Vulnerability Alerts IAVAs submitted from higher headquarters for applicability and direct testing and installation by system administrators Provide IA representation at enterprise Configuration Control Board CCB presenting assessments and recommendations to CCB Chair on submitted system configuration changes Perform selfinspections on enterprise security configurations and IA programs based on DoD and joint operation frameworks Assess system security controls review system security documentation including configuration and risk management plans perform test and security analysis evaluation activities on both existing and new customer systems delivered into classified facilities Leverage IA subject matter expertise to customer and mission partners during the development lifecycle of systems to develop and sustain an insider threat detection capability Team Lead Leidos Huntsville AL May 2012 to October 2014 Accomplish human resource strategies by determining accountabilities and annual merit schedules communicate and enforce values policies and procedures implement recruitment selection orientation training coaching counseling disciplinary and communication programs plan monitor appraise and review job contributions across multisite geographically separated organization Provide direct management to site team providing corporate insight and leadership during challenging corporate spinoff Interface with Contractor Officer Representative COR and higher corporate leadership to gain approval and schedule team members for specialized training classes resulting in Computing Environment certifications satisfying 8570 requirements for contract Information Systems Security of Information Assurance IA related continuity and training documentation achieving 100 compliance of organizational policies IT Manager US Air Force December 1996 to February 2010 Monitored network hardware for equipment failure or performance degradation Created and maintained standardized system software hardware baseline for all sensitive compartmented information facility SCIF office network configure Cisco VPN and Taclane network security appliances restoring secure network communications to home base Planned and executed network transition to new location during office move with zero configuration errors resulting in immediate 100 network availability to all users Accomplished quarterly selfinspections of all hardware and software on department networks Only department in agency wide inventory reconciling over one million dollars worth of inventory discrepancies with 100 correct inventory Education BS in Information Technology Western Governors University Online 2009 to 2013
